With Rasheed Wallace at the 5, and his ability to http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_45pt_vs_Reggie_Miller_41pts_Indiana_Pacers_00/01_NBA_Playoffs_Gm2_*Fancy_move The first half was Reggie Miller 's. The game belonged to Allen Iverson . Allen Iverson scored a career playoff-high 45 points, including 19 in the third quarter, as the Philadelphia 76ers overcame Reggie Miller 's 41 points, beating the Indiana Pacers 116-98 Tuesday night to even their first-round series at 1-1. Game 3 of the best-of-five Eastern Conference quarterfinals is Saturday in Indiana.`` I'm going to remember this game for a long time, said Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists.`` I've been playing a lot off my God-given ability. This game took a lot of thinking. I'm pleased with my mental aspect coming into the game
